Class LibrarySystem

java.lang.Object
com.library.LibrarySystem
public class LibrarySystem extends Object
Command‐line interface handling user interaction.

    Registers a new borrower, prompting for name, email and phone, then auto-generating an ID like BOR-0004, etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • LibrarySystem

      public LibrarySystem(Library lib, Scanner in)
      Parameters:
      lib - library service
      in - input scanner (e.g. System.in)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the main menu loop.

    • printMenu

      private void printMenu()

    • center

      private static String center(String s, int w)
      Centers s in a field of width w, padding with spaces.

    • padRight

      private static String padRight(String s, int w)
      Pads s on the right with spaces to exactly width w.

    • addBook

      private void addBook()
      Prompts the user step-by-step to add a new book. If an unknown type is entered, prints an error and returns to main menu.

    • removeBook

      private void removeBook()
      Prompts for a book ID and removes it.

    • searchBooks

      private void searchBooks()
      Prompts for a search keyword, displays matching books, or shows an error and returns if no matches are found.

    • listBooks

      private void listBooks()
      Lists all books in the catalog.

    • registerBorrower

      private void registerBorrower()
      Registers a new borrower, prompting for name, email and phone, then auto-generating an ID like BOR-0004, etc.

    • registerLibrarian

      private void registerLibrarian()
      Registers a new librarian, prompting for name, email and phone, then auto-generating an ID like LIB-0004, etc.

    • listUsers

      private void listUsers()
      Displays all registered users.

    • placeHold

      private void placeHold()
      Places a hold for a borrower on a book. Only books currently issued can be placed on hold.

    • listHolds

      private void listHolds()
      Prompts for a book ID and prints the current hold queue book in the format “Borrower Name – Request Date”. If no holds exist, an informational message is shown and the user is returned to the main menu.

    • issueBook

      private void issueBook()
      Issues a book to a borrower by a librarian. If it’s already issued, or IDs are invalid, prints an explicit message.

    • renewLoan

      private void renewLoan()
      Renews an existing loan if eligible.

    • returnBook

      private void returnBook()
      Returns a borrowed book.

    • displayOverdue

      private void displayOverdue()
      Displays all overdue loans. informs the user if no overdue.

    • userReport

      private void userReport()
      Shows loan history for a specific borrower. If they have not borrowed anything yet, displays an informational message.
